20110126030316.000|20110126030320.000|CC1|PEOPLE OF OPPORTUNITY.

20110126030322.000|20110126030324.000|CC1|WHAT SETS US APART MUST NOT JUST
20110126030324.000|20110126030327.000|CC1|BE OUR POWER.                   
20110126030327.000|20110126030330.000|CC1|IT MUST ALSO BE THE PURPOSE     
20110126030330.000|20110126030331.000|CC1|BEHIND IT.                      
20110126030331.000|20110126030334.000|CC1|IN SOUTH SUDAN, WITH OUR        
20110126030334.000|20110126030336.000|CC1|ASSISTANCE THE PEOPLE WERE      
20110126030336.000|20110126030337.000|CC1|FINALLY ABLE TO VOTE FOR        
20110126030337.000|20110126030340.000|CC1|INDEPENDENCE AFTER YEARS OF WAR.
20110126030340.000|20110126030345.000|CC1|THOUSANDS LINED UP BEFORE DAWN. 
20110126030345.000|20110126030348.000|CC1|PEOPLE DANCED IN THE STREETS.   
20110126030348.000|20110126030350.000|CC1|ONE MAN WHO LOST FOUR OF HIS    
20110126030350.000|20110126030351.000|CC1|BROTHERS AT WAR SUMMED UP THE   
20110126030351.000|20110126030352.000|CC1|SCENE AROUND HIM.               
20110126030352.000|20110126030354.000|CC1|THIS WAS A BATTLEFIELD FOR MOST

20110126030909.000|20110126030914.000|CC1|NO MATTER WHERE YOU COME FROM.

20110126030916.000|20110126030918.000|CC1|HERE BEFORE YOU TONIGHT.        
20110126030918.000|20110126030921.000|CC1|THAT DREAM IS WHY A WORKING     
20110126030921.000|20110126030924.000|CC1|CLASS KID FROM SCRANTON CAN SIT 
20110126030924.000|20110126030933.000|CC1|BEHIND ME.

20110126030935.000|20110126030936.000|CC1|BEGAN BY SWEEPING THE FLOORS OF 
20110126030936.000|20110126030939.000|CC1|HIS FATHER'S CINCINNATI BAR CAN 
20110126030939.000|20110126030940.000|CC1|PRESIDE AS SPEAKER OF THE HOUSE 
20110126030940.000|20110126030949.000|CC1|IN THE GREATEST NATION ON EARTH.
20110126030949.000|20110126031001.000|CC1|[ APPLAUSE ]                    
20110126031001.000|20110126031004.000|CC1|THAT DREAM, THAT AMERICAN DREAM,
20110126031004.000|20110126031005.000|CC1|IS WHAT DROVE THE ALLEN BROTHERS
20110126031005.000|20110126031007.000|CC1|TO REINVENT THEIR ROOFING       
20110126031007.000|20110126031010.000|CC1|COMPANY FOR A NEW ERA.          
20110126031010.000|20110126031014.000|CC1|IT'S WHAT DROVE THOSE STUDENTS  
20110126031014.000|20110126031017.000|CC1|AT FORSYTH TECH TO LEARN A NEW  
20110126031017.000|20110126031018.000|CC1|SKILL AND WORK TOWARD THE FUTURE
20110126031018.000|20110126031021.000|CC1|AND THAT DREAM IS THE STORY OF A
20110126031021.000|20110126031024.000|CC1|SMALL BUSINESS OWNER NAMED      
20110126031024.000|20110126031026.000|CC1|BRANDON FISHER.                 
20110126031026.000|20110126031028.000|CC1|BRANDON STARTED A COMPANY IN    
20110126031028.000|20110126031030.000|CC1|BERLIN, PENNSYLVANIA, THAT      
20110126031030.000|20110126031032.000|CC1|SPECIALIZES IN A NEW KIND OF    
20110126031032.000|20110126031034.000|CC1|DRILLING TECHNOLOGY.            
20110126031034.000|20110126031036.000|CC1|AND ONE DAY LAST SUMMER, HE SAW 
20110126031036.000|20110126031040.000|CC1|THE NEWS THAT HALFWAY ACROSS THE
20110126031040.000|20110126031044.000|CC1|WORLD 33 MEN WERE TRAPPED IN A  
20110126031044.000|20110126031045.000|CC1|CHILEAN MINE AND NO ONE KNEW HOW
20110126031045.000|20110126031049.000|CC1|TO SAVE THEM.                   
20110126031049.000|20110126031051.000|CC1|BUT BRANDON THOUGHT HIS COMPANY 
20110126031051.000|20110126031056.000|CC1|COULD HELP AND SO HE DESIGNED A 
20110126031056.000|20110126031058.000|CC1|RESCUE TO COME TO BE KNOWN AS   
20110126031058.000|20110126031059.000|CC1|PLAN "B."                       
20110126031059.000|20110126031102.000|CC1|HIS EMPLOYEES WORKED AROUND THE 
20110126031102.000|20110126031105.000|CC1|CLOCK TO MANUFACTURE THE        
20110126031105.000|20110126031105.000|CC1|NECESSARY DRILLING EQUIPMENT.   
20110126031105.000|20110126031107.000|CC1|ALONG WITH OTHERS, HE BEGAN     
20110126031107.000|20110126031109.000|CC1|DRILLING A 2,000-FOOT HOLE INTO 
20110126031109.000|20110126031112.000|CC1|THE GROUND WORKING THREE OR FOUR
20110126031112.000|20110126031113.000|CC1|DAYS AT A TIME WITHOUT ANY      
20110126031113.000|20110126031116.000|CC1|SLEEP.                          
20110126031116.000|20110126031119.000|CC1|37 DAYS LATER, PLAN "B"         
20110126031119.000|20110126031119.000|CC1|SUCCEEDED.                      
20110126031119.000|20110126031126.000|CC1|AND THE MINERS WERE RESCUED.    
20110126031126.000|20110126031132.000|CC1|[ APPLAUSE ]                    
20110126031132.000|20110126031134.000|CC1|BUT BECAUSE HE DIDN'T WANT ALL  
20110126031134.000|20110126031135.000|CC1|THE ATTENTION, BRANDON WASN'T   
20110126031135.000|20110126031138.000|CC1|THERE WHEN THE MINERS EMERGED.  
20110126031138.000|20110126031139.000|CC1|HE'D ALREADY GONE BACK HOME.    
20110126031139.000|20110126031141.000|CC1|BACK TO WORK ON HIS NEXT        
20110126031141.000|20110126031143.000|CC1|PROJECT.                        
20110126031143.000|20110126031145.000|CC1|AND LATER ONE OF HIS EMPLOYEES  
20110126031145.000|20110126031150.000|CC1|SAID OF THE RESCUE, WE PROVED   
20110126031150.000|20110126031151.000|CC1|THAT CENTER ROCK IS A LITTLE    
20110126031151.000|20110126031159.000|CC1|COMPANY BUT WE DO BIG THINGS.
